mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from airplane where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into airplane values(#{airplane_no}, #{airplane_name}, to_date(replace(#{departrue_date}, 'T', ''), 'YYYY-MM-DDHH24:MI:SS'), to_date(replace(#{arrival_date}, 'T', ''), 'YYYY-MM-DDHH24:MI:SS'), #{departrue}, #{arrival}, #{total_seat}, #{total_seat}, #{price})
